attributes.action: Students should get enough time to complete exams and should not be pressured.
attributes.background: Pupils of all ages especially in high school feel they are being pressured by time in exams and cannot concentrate on their test resulting in worse than the grades than they should have got. They should have enough time to complete exams until they believe they are finished or extend the time limit.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of exam boards, not the UK Government or Parliament.
